author: Staff Reporter
text:
Students participating in the painting competition as part of World Diabetes Day at CMC in Vellore on Saturday.— Photo:C. Venkatachalapathy

Painting, essay and quiz competitions were organised by the department of endocrinology, diabetes and metabolism, Christian Medical College, Vellore on Saturday.

The painting competition titled ‘junk food versus healthy eating’ and essay competition titled ‘If you are given an opportunity to make school health policies regarding healthy eating what would you do?’ were held for school students and quiz titled ‘general health and non communicable diseases (scientific aspects and history) was held for school teachers.

Students from schools in and around Vellore participated.
title: CMC conducts competitions for students on health policies
